amendment.description: Amendment sought to delete funding for the Yucca Mountain nuclear waste disposal program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to strike the provisions in the bill for nuclear waste disposal activities.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Porter amendment (A012) Failed by recorded vote: 80 - 351 (Roll no. 516).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A012) offered by Mr. Porter.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
